description: Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Lower Evaluated Price, No Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement, Nature of Requirements: Two (2) Fume Hoods.
full_summary:
NEED NO. 5000070204R2: LABORATORY AND SCIENTIFIC EQUIPMENT (FUME HOODS)
=============================================================

**Government Invitation to Tender**

Environment and Climate Change Canada invites trade-qualified suppliers to participate in the solicitation of bid for Two (2) Fume Hoods.

**trade agreements**
-------------------

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**procurement strategy**
------------------------

Competitive procurement strategy will be employed, using the lowest evaluated price as the basis for award.

**product and service description**
---------------------------------

Two (2) fume hoods are required. The products and services must be in accordance with the mandatory criteria specified in the Attachment documents.

**target audience**
-------------------

This solicitation is for pre-qualified suppliers who have a trade agreement with Public Works and Government Services Canada for Laboratory and Scientific equipment. 

**eligibility criteria**
-----------------------

To be eligible, suppliers must have a Supply Arrangement for the supply of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada. Suppliers who do not have a Supply Arrangement for this scope of work will not be eligible to bid.

**submission process**
----------------------

Pre-qualified suppliers will receive a Request for Proposal (RFP) document and a Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP). Suppliers must respond to the RFP and submit a bid as per the instructions in the RFP. All bids received from unpre-qualified suppliers will not be evaluated.

**procedural details**
-------------------------

The submission deadline is January 31, 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time.

Contracting officer: Marie-Pier Dubois
Phone: 438-316-0454
Email: mariepier.dubois2@ec.gc.ca
Address: 105 McGill Street, Montreal, QC, H2Y 2E7.

For more information on this solicitation, and to access the Attachment documents, please visit Buy and Sell Canada.

```
Attachments:
* Request for Proposal (RFP) document
* Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) document
* Bidder checklist and instructions
```
